## Requirements

* PHP 5.4 or later.

## Installation

```php
include_once 'ems-php/vendor/autoload.php';
```

## Getting started

First create a new API client with your API key and EMS product:

```php
use \GingerPayments\Payment\Ginger;

$client = Ginger::createClient('ems-api-key');
```
